tool_description: Summarize textual content (ie: reviews and more) into a powerful and highly compact format, Pros and Cons, using Fakespot's Generative Pre-trained Transformer (GPT) model.
name: Pros and Cons
title: Pros and Cons

api_list.name: Pros-and-Cons Summarization
api_list.description: Concise and coherent pros-and-cons summaries of large-scale textual data.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pros-and-cons.p.rapidapi.com/pros-and-cons"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pros-and-cons.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://pros-and-cons.p.rapidapi.com/pros-and-cons"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

print(response.json())
